title: NASA planning new world order?
text:
Project Blue Beam conspiracy theory suggests NASA has secret plans to create new world order Matthew Dunn news.com.au Project Blue Beam conspiracy theory suggests NASA has secret plans to create new world order Matthew Dunn news.com.au The cityscape seen in the sky over China has fuelled speculation over Project Blue Beam. 
WHEN a bizarre event was captured on film showing what appeared to be dark skyscrapers floating in the clouds above China, the world was puzzled. 
While scientists were quick to dismiss the occurrence as a mirage, not all agreed. 
In the days after the event, one particular conspiracy theory started to gather serious momentum â€” the belief the sighting was the result of a secret NASA mission known as Project Blue Beam. 
Canadian journalist and conspiracy theorist Serge Monast first developed the theory in 1994, before publishing his beliefs in a book entitled Project Blue Beam . 
The theory suggests NASA and the United Nations are planning to create a new world order by using technologically simulated mind control to shape a global New Age religion. 
Mr Monast believed generating a global New Age religion was the only thing that would make a worldwide dictatorship possible. Other Stories
